# uptimekuma_notification_keep (Resource)

Keep notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_keep" "example" {
  name        = "Keep Notifications"
  is_active   = true
  webhook_url = "https://api.keephq.dev/alerts/alert"
  api_key     = "your-keep-api-key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Keep API key for authentication
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) Keep webhook URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
